properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: We spent one night off the track starting from the small harbor direction south east. After about 12km there is a clear spot on the left check on Google satellite view where it is possible to hide from the track. A couple of deers came to eat the grass around. Just a quiet location nothing more. No view no swimming no service nothing. We contribute with this spot only because we had hard times finding locations  We hope someone finds it useful.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Great place to park the bus. The road is very rocky and when oncoming traffic is also narrow so nothing for a Womo but ideal for a VW bus  van 5min walk is a small bay where there are few people and you can also swim nudists. During the day there are a few people there to swim but otherwise everything is quiet and we had everything to ourselves. Since the place is a bit remote we had no problems with the police. Spent two nights here

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)
properties.description: Parking lot at the port with several small beaches. But you can also drive the gravel road further back. There is a No Passage sign attached but the gate is permanently open. At the back there are various small parking spaces with a beautiful view and direct access to the sea.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Beautiful place in the middle of nature. Perfect sea view very romantic. Stayed here for one night. Overwhelming.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.07)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.48)
properties.description: Perfect place for camping in the offseason on the island. Hidden in the woods. In summer the car park is probably the starting point for hiking tours. The place can be approached from two sides. The road is relatively narrow and rather not suitable for larger motorhomes.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.2)
properties.description: Free parking in any case off season located right next to Paradise Beach. Full of restaurants bars and activities nearby. No service on the parking but there are showers and toilets on the beach. We did not spend the night there but I think it must be possible.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.57)
properties.description: Place on a gravel road. I didnt see any prohibition signs. Easily accessible with a van and some driving skills but its more dirt road than road. For RVs Im thinking of chances. We had a quiet night in the offseason surrounded by peace and nature. It is a wonderful point to start a hike for experienced paddlers the island of Sveti Grgur is also worth a visit with its lost place and tame deer.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)
properties.description: Small square under the pine trees facing the sea to spend a moment

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)
properties.description: Place in parking bay directly on the street. At night hardly any cars come these hardly bother. Depending on how one stands one can not be seen from the street. Space is slightly downhill. However the view of Cres and the harbor is beautiful.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Large open green grassy area to park some flat surfaces around. The access road is quite small narrow and rocky but our 7m van made it. No services. Very close to the town of Lopar and the surrounding beaches are a short walk from here. This is a beautiful peaceful place on the top of a small hill surrounded by pine trees please keep it beautiful by taking all of your rubbish away and not leaving it looking like a toilet. Safe travels

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: The usual water dispensers at a gas station. water runs slowly. Dont know if the drinking water is either. We better filter it again. You can also buy gas here.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

A little further down are 2 or 3 other places.We slept well I spent a lot of time at the viewpoint hiking on foot and by mountain bike

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.18)
properties.description: Several possible locations along this path. Access a bit difficult beware of big stones.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.43)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

The old town is a 10minute drive away and there are numerous shopping opportunities. We were able to spend a day and a night here undisturbed. During the day this space is used by bathers.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Parking on a side of a road serving only as access to the public beach 50m distance from the beach. Beach bar and restaurant on the spot. Place become completely empty during the evening  night. Weve spend the night here without any problems.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)

The place can be reached via 3 ways we recommend the one that is furthest away from the interior of the island and thus closest to the ferry to the mainland. At first we took another one but it was a bit very adventurous. In between there are locals with dogs or for a swim otherwise you are undisturbed.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.17)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.33)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.22)

properties.name: Parking MH without service (3)

properties.name: Extra services (4)

properties.description: Source decent amount of water even in dry season.

Anyone looking for peace and quiet is isolated from everything here. Houses all broken old bus stops everything abandoned and deserted. But there are always spaces here where you can just stand in peace. Cars hardly ever come here for long as there really isnt even any consumption here just nothing for a long time. If youre scared it might be too scary for you.

properties.name: Extra services (4.62)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)

Accessible to all the entrance is between two small concrete bollards followed by a dirt and pebble path you have to go all the way down and you will find the beach there. Disadvantage we had a lot of wind but once in the van it does not prevent you from sleeping

properties.name: Picnic area (4.33)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.91)

There is a beach shower back down the road on the corner and a great bar called hablandos which sells affordable drinks and food.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.67)
properties.description: There was a strong wind near the water so we found this quiet place in the woods. No one around just birds and trees. The road is quite good 4x4 is not needed.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Nature spot after the campsite at the farm take the 1st track on the left and very quickly you arrive at the edge of the lake with very easy access to the bank. flat and grassy terrain

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Little used good asphalt road 5km long.Parking by the channel connecting Lake Vransko with the sea.I asked the locals fishing from the shore if I could stay here one night  they said of course you can and gave me a beer.Next to it there is a walking path 745 m to the lake along the canal. Good access. Quiet.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Lovely little spot not far from the road. Its very quiet at night and you wont be disturbed by anyone else that yourself.There is a small gravel road leading up to it thats steep in the beginning. Fine for cars and vans but Im not sure how easy it will be to access with a motorhome.Since its behind a hill you wont be seen and the road is muffled down. No services are provided since its not an official parking spot. There is a little tree plantation next to it. Its not clear what the owners think of people camping out there.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Riverside location. Accessible via a dirt road. Locals drop by in the evenings and mornings but we had no problems. You should definitely not go swimming in the river because the fertilized fields run in here.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: A small place near the road. The closest home in 50 meters. Sea is in two steps

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.38)
properties.description: A beautiful and quiet place to sleep and with a restaurant nearby refrain from very large motorhomes because to arrive the road is in stones but it passes.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.83)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Are parked for picnic and swimming lots of places to spend the night several campers were already present

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.44)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.88)

properties.name: Picnic area (4.75)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Paid parking paying in CASH and left in a mailbox at the entrance on private land very quiet and safe This parking is monitored.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Beach front. 5 minutes walk to the village of Betina where you can find lots of restaurants. Great night life Lots of possibilities of exploring the region by bike. We slept here 3 nights without problems. Be quiet and dont leave any trash

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: A rather deserted parking lot next to an abandoned building. very large perfect for vehicles that cannot venture into the parking lot opposite. not super glamorous but we spent two quiet nights there

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)
properties.description: Large car park ok for one night in the low season. Stood with caravan without any problems. Most likely crowded in season or still a good parking option.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.73)
properties.description: Beautiful and quiet place for entertaining the nature. We stayed here for hiking and swimming. If you go 200 meters along canyon you will find a path to go down to waterfall and old mill.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.79)
properties.description: Just a bit further down the road from the other spot magnificent view of the canyon and the waterfall. If you have a large vehicle you will have to back out as the turning place is not very large. We did a million point turn in our 6m Sprinter. Space for one camper or two if you want to be social... There is a walking path that leads down to the river youll find it on the road between the bushes just a few meters from the parking spot its marked by two big piles of stones. There is a little beach down there if the water level isnt to high where we spend the afternoon swimming. 4G cellphone reception at the parking spot.KEEP THIS PLACE CLEAN PLEASE

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.2)
properties.description: In the parking lot of the chapel and the ruins. There is shade a nice view of the lagoon. The path is passable.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.54)
properties.description: We have spent the night here on Tuesday August 8. It is a good place quiet and with many services around but very early in the morning there is noise from people who come to park to go shopping so the doors make a lot of noise when they close them and they talk too.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.67)
properties.description: All empty. Very quiet night. The amusement park is already completely closed.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.76)
properties.description: Nice quiet view in a dead end a house at the end with a couple of seniors who sell cheese and honey. Do not hesitate to see them with fruits and vegetables as they are far from everything. Departure of superb hiking trails in the gorges. Rest area 30 minutes walk from the spot. Really its worth it.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)

Campers can be parked here lengthwise behind the gas station but they are not specifically intended for this purpose they are also occupied by cars. Opposite the parking lot is a supermarket. Rates are listed in the photo.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)

You can park your car right by the water. However there is only room for 2 vans maximum. The road there is very bumpy but passable. Excellent for vans cars and transporters.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.33)

properties.name: Extra services (5)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.33)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)

The place is easily accessible leave the main road in height to go down by a small paved road to the edge of the river. GPS coordinates 44.2044703 15.6667430 Google Maps does not know the path that leads there you have to choose the type of satellite map to display it.

properties.description: We found a spot to spend the night in peace on a forest road with very little traffic. After the hamlet of Oberberg we continued to climb the forest road. There is a sign with written in German continue on this road at your own risk at the start of the forest road which is no longer asphalted. It remains of fairly good quality we were in a van and had no problems. It can be more complicated with a bigger vehicle especially to find a good spot. Along the road there are several rather flat spots to stop. We chose a spot right by the road at the entrance to a field with a clear view of the valley and the mountains opposite. We were able to stretch out our hammocks and enjoy the view A small cool stream allowed us to shower. A few cars passed we received big smiles Dont hesitate to climb as much as possible until you find a good spot The GPS point shown here is not accurate at all but it indicates the forest road in question.

The place to be precise called Enfretors on the other hand is located in a point where the But valley already crossed in ancient times by the Roman road Julia Augusta which connected Aquileia to Norico narrows and therefore assumed for centuries a considerable strategic importance in the control and defense of the territory.

Nearby beyond the bridge there is a drinking water fountain. Excellent place as a starting point for summer and winter trekking routes. The village offers 1 grocery store about 300 meters away and 2 restaurants with Carnic cuisine Cristofoli about 500 meters away and Le Falene about 800 meters away. Also a short distance away in the center of the village is the 18th century parish church and a modern art gallery. IMPORTANT In addition to being dangerous due to sudden floods it is technically not possible to bathe in the stream

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.42)
properties.description: P3 Sufficient unpaved parking spaces very close to the lake and the road. Depending on the weather the caretaker is on site from around 700 a.m. to 700 p.m. The cost for campers on P3 is 11 euros for one night directly 5 meters behind on P4 it is already 35 euros So be careful when entering. The toilets open around 3060 minutes after the caretaker arrives as his wife cleans the toilets thoroughly beforehand. It is recommended to arrive before the official closing time in order to pay for the night straight away otherwise you will be woken up in the morning and charged. Vehicles over 2.20m cannot drive onto the site at any time. There are a few toilets on the lake site but they all usually close around 700 p.m. It is recommended not to position yourself at an angle or outside the usual parking rules otherwise you will be the first to be woken up and asked to move your car. The place starts to fill up with day visitors from 730 at the latest and is full from around 10001100.

At other parking spaces by the lake anglers stayed overnight. We went to sleep and drove on the next morning at around 10 a.m. without any problems. I think there is no problem sleeping. access by an asphalt road at the beginning then gravel but easily passable and flat. With our campervan of 3m high no worries. to park its pretty flat. I think the night has to be calm with a beautiful starry sky. thank you for respecting nature and recovering your garbage.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: It is an earthen parking lot of a small cemetery. We arrived around 2230 because we had to leave the place in the wilderness next to it. Because young people came to celebrate. The car park is quiet even though it is next to the road. We left at 900 no one came to tell us that we were disturbing.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Secluded and wellprotected site in an easily navigable quarry. Nice view of the mountains. The somewhat lower location with the stony subsoil.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: It is an old station site there are no more trains which is a bit hidden and cannot be seen.The entire space is concreted and therefore easily accessible even with a length of 6.40 m. Access is via a very old wooden bridge up to 5t.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)
properties.description: Small parking near restaurant.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.44)
properties.description: Picnic area managed by the Una national park. Out of season end of October possibility of staying there overnight paid the camping area 300m before is inaccessible for a cc steep slope with hairpin bend. Grassy and relatively flat pitches. Access to toilets and a sink cold water in the tourist information hut. Same price as the campsite with less services ... The park wardens come to collect the money at the end of the afternoon. The place is still very beautiful and quiet. Village very close to see.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking at the side of a very quiet road on the edge of a cliff and above Martin Brod. Exceptional view

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Beautiful secluded pitch in nature. Flat surface no fourwheel drive required. 200m next to a road with little traffic. Mountain view. Limited visibility from the street.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.75)
properties.description: Nice spot right on a mountain lake. Lots of locals on the weekend to party who invited us to eat. It goes up a gravel road that has potholes but works well.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.78)
properties.description: Here is a public lot at the base of dinares. fort glavas is visible and just a short 5 min hike up hill. a local man steppan was very nice and friendly. he shared much history and knowledge with me and taught me some croatian. his family has lived in this region for hundreds of years. the parking lot is right by his house. if you go here be kind and you will as well be treated with kindness  the police drive by but do not have a problem with campervans overnight.    interestingly there is even free wifi. steppan offered us to stay there for many days.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: spring water at the roadside.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Ideal and quiet location under a magnificent railway bridge. There is good access to the Una River for swimming. The access road is 1.5 km of beautiful gravel road lightly overgrown in many parts. In the last part there is a small bridge made of railway beams it has been repaired. The bridge looks sturdy but you never know how longweight it will hold. 4x4 vehicles can avoid crossing the bridge as an alternative on the right side.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Small car park to visit the cave that is 100 meters up the hill. The cave is impressive and free to enter. It is essential to bring headlamps and spare lights to visit it as well as hiking shoes. We didnt spend the night but I dont think there is a problem although it is quite uneven.

properties.name: Extra services (4.83)
properties.description: Water point at the roadside. Not sure it is drinkable.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Good place for a night. calm traffic from cars. Not far from a beautiful place Cetina River Spring Blue Eye. in the evening you can hear the ringing of bells from the church from the neighboring village. mountain view very nice and calm

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Near the spring at Cetina Small gravel place next to clean toilets open all day.

properties.name: Extra services (4.67)
properties.description: Water tap next to the cemetery. 34 hose adapter required.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Spring water with good flow.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: There are beautiful meadows to stop on to the right and left of the path. Great view over the fields. A flock of sheep passed by with the shepherd. Super friendly. He said it would be no problem to stay overnight. I had a quiet night. The path is a gravel path but can be managed easily with 2wheel drive.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Small parking near school and sport place. Square is near too.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: Good spring water by the roadside. There is a small parking bay in front to pull over.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: Since you are no longer allowed to park at the old site and there is no real alternative we had to look for a new place. This parking space is only 13 minutes from the spring Blue Eye or Cetina spring.The access to the site is a bit narrow and in places not very high. The ground is gravel and branchesbushes hang in the path. Our vehicle 2.50 high 1.80 wide fit through here.NO prohibition signs NO access restrictions NO height restrictions branches hang down

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Nice parking next to fortress with free entrance and no people. We didnt spend night but i definitely would if i need this location. There is one camera but i dont think it would be problem for staying. Also Im not sure if is possible to go there with bigger vehicle as motorhome etc. Anyway I would recomend this place GREAT VIEWS

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking lot with WiFi. the other places have eu wifi. That does not work. this one does.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Gas station with small shop and free water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.33)
properties.description: Large car park near the former bus station quiet place near the town with a view of the fortress with public toilets

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.71)
properties.description: Beautiful view. Easily accessible for any vehicle. no service The road is next to it and the parking space is clearly visible. But there is very little traffic and the road is far enough away. We spent a very quiet night. No cars at night.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Quiet spot by the river. Access through a graveldirt road following the river. At some point the road divides in 2 like a Y. Around there are some spots. Tree gallery to get there so branches will touch on the sides and top a bit.Tiny river grass beach hidden near the Y.Spring water 200m before the spot on the dirt road.Some locals driving around but very few.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.71)
properties.description: Beautiful spot by the lake we stayed here two nights with no problems. Access road unpaved but easily passable. With wet ground it would probably be difficult to arrive. Accessible with any size of camper.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: 2 narrow paths from the road to access a very large place where you can easily find a spot. very calm quiet where you can easily get level. Few fisherman been there for few days but its very big lake and you dont hear any noise. It was october and we were swimming. There are many places to make bonefire. When you drive from sinj and you see the lake take first right and than drive abou 500m near lekr. This is the Best way if you dont have 4x4 or high van.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.18)
properties.description: Parking on grass near the lake. Very calm and beautifull view on the mountain and village on the othersite of the lake. Road is not for heavy and big vans because of a step in the street at the beginning and trees.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Open space on the road overlooking the Una river almost flat. The road ends at Strbacki Buk waterfalls so no one goes through the night

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.67)
properties.description: Beautiful place next to the lake with a great view and a lot of space so even if its occupy by someone you will find a free spot for you for sure Water in the lake is clear so you can swim and wash. During our stay a dog emerged from the bushes and accompanied us throughout our stay. You can see that he is neglected but tame and harmless.

properties.name: Picnic area (3)
properties.description: Very nice place to have a picnic along the Una river inside the national park. Its just off the road culdesac to the waterfalls. So during the day cars and even buses go by but its quiet at night. There are two covered picnic tables a toilet Dixi a fire pit and there is a garbage can. The water is beautiful but cold. You need a permit to fish here. The grassy bit isnt very flat the top bit right next to the road is flatter.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: We stayed here one night. A very beautiful place 20 meters from the water. Approach on thick and stable gravel. This was not a problem with our large motorhome. The place is on a slope. Our normal corners were enough to line us up.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: A beautiful spot next to a graveyard in the middle of nowhere. We had a very quiet night. The road to get there is tight but in good condition.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: Great place for a motorhome . Incredible view swimming in turquoise waters. Fairly difficult access by a small road but you go by van or motorhome. Slightly sloping terrain but worth the detour

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.58)
properties.description: Small parking area in the middle of nowhere. You stand at the exit of the via ferrata. Here you have your peace and a beautiful sunset. No supply and suitable for a maximum of one night. Hiking and climbing car park is about 4 km away perfect for climbing hiking and mountain biking.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Parking right next to the road no shade. Starting point for climbing zip line and hiking trails. Just a few minutes to watch on Canyon cikola.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Newly built car park. Very narrow access. More for small and narrow vehicles.Overnight stay possible for a fee.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Water source

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: At the church on a road with little traffic. A faucet that works even in winter. good pressure

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.22)
properties.description: Large parking lot at the 1st entrance to the natural park very quiet location the forest warden is very friendly the waterfalls are 14 km away on foot three friendly dogs live there also. Have some dog food with you and show them love they deserve.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Generous paved parking space directly on the stream surrounded by pure nature. From here you can walk to the source of the Sanica

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: In the end of the gravel road accesible with 7m long camper is small parking place. We asked local guy from.nearby house and he confirm we can stay overnight and free. Its perfect place to visit Dabarska pecina and walking around. The night was calm and we were there alone 30.4.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.78)
properties.description: We spent the night at this gas station in the parking lots behind the restaurant. There were also some trucks parked but the night was pretty quiet. Toilets are available both in the customer restaurant and in the shop. The road is nearby and there is some noise but nothing too annoying.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Parking lot by the Sanski Most waterfall with a bar and playground. Very steep but doable with wedges. Ask at the ticket counter below for a tour. The path to the waterfall is 500 meters along a wooden path. Not suitable for strollers. No toilets Please only arrive with your own toilet. Garbage cans available.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.5)
properties.description: Beautiful spot right next to the Krusnica river. A 20 minute walk from the spring of the river which is worth visiting. Next to a fishing club a person from the club visiting in the morning and had no issue with us there.The drive down is probably not suitable for larger motorhomes. It was just about fine in our lwb sprinter albeit with a few branch scrapes.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: A lovely place for outdoor camping. under the bridge is a open ground were you can go with your car and no one was saying something. just friendly hello. but there is actually no infrastructure around..but the Dabar is coming right from the spring so the water is very clean and fresh. we were sleeping there two nights. the bridge is making some noise when cars driving over it but its not so bad and not many cars.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Parking overlooking the town of Kljuc. At the edge of a forest at the crossroads of paths. Starting point to discover the fortress which dominates the city on foot 10 minutes away. Very quiet. Be careful only for vans and vans because the road is narrow but the surface is in good condition. Follow sign indicating Stari Grad. Flat parking.

properties.name: Picnic area (5)
properties.description: Large space first with picnic tables and a little further without services but much cleaner. There is a lot of waste in the first area then a little less. Large grassy area close to the river and very quiet we asked the locals if we could sleep here there was no problem just dont leave your waste the premises look devastated... We spent two very quiet nights Perfect for our two dogs and our cat and a small puppy is on site do not hesitate to feed him he is very fearful but adorable and is just waiting for a family

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.27)
properties.description: Free parking by the river with swimming diving board water point daytime toilet picnic table barbecue bar basketball court volleyball football in short a corner of Bosnian paradise. And very quiet at night.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Drinking water point with nozzle easy to access thanks to the parking lot right next door. Filling with a can I dont think its possible to fill up a camper van unless you have a long hose.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Very quiet place near the tennis court close to the downtown. Just follow the road to the tennis court. After the little bridge follow the gravel road. Many spots all along this road some with good shade. Several accesses to the river. Many swimming places in the area and downtown.Drinkable water can be filled in the village.WiFi in town including without a password around the bar on the downtown river islands.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: VESERAJ LAUNDRY Opening hours from 0900 to 1600 Laundry Self Service It is actually a launderette but with service attended thats why it has hours by Amela a very pleasant and smiling girl. We got along with her through the translator. 30 KM for the 18 kg washing machine including drying. Private parking for small Camper. AC in the parking lot of the SUPERMARKET supermarket.

properties.name: Picnic area (3)
properties.description: A little spot next to the river. Few vehicles passed on the main road.Mosque wake up for overnight stays. Seats to picnic on and a concrete platform for swimming.Everybody left us alone.Pretty good.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.67)
properties.description: Paid parking from 700 till 2400 price is 1KM hour there are some places suitable for 7 meters motorhome but not all. Nice place to explore the surroundings with a view to the river where you can swim or have a boat ride.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.33)
properties.description: Parking near the stadium

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.33)
properties.description: Large gravel parking lot near the center Somewhat hidden between 2 traffic lights on the left in an inner courtyard. Min. 1 KM but very cheap for 4 hours. It may be possible to stay overnight.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: PSP Sabina Laundry service  fast service We went there at 9 am and and around 7.30 pm it was ready  the same day 7 MK per machine  we paid 32 MK

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Nice place by the river accessible with fire place and table for locals. Possible to get into water but not deep. Limited signal only Edge at night 3G in the morning . Quiet night

properties.name: Extra services (4.5)
properties.description: Fuel and Gas station there are all adapters available to fill German bottles. you can stay overnight  only ask owner Mio he will be pleased. freshwater and change toilet no problem. 5 Euros for all...overnight and water ..toilet and electricity..

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Free overnight parking conveniently located just off the main road. Easy access for all vehicles. A good alternative to the garage down the road

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Quiet place perfect for a break or a night no shade possibility of approaching the Una river but as it was raining we stayed on the stabilized

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Path off the main road tarmacked to the point quite narrow for camper vans. Lost but quiet place. Be careful of branches on the ground that need to be pushed to avoid puncturing a wheel.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.2)
properties.description: A nice big parking lot near some big stones. With allwheel drive you can drive a little closer. With a nice view.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Very nice gravel place on a small island.The Una is very refreshing for swimming.The road from the other bank is very busy and therefore noisy.Access is possible via a bad dirt road coming from the north. Large potholes some still filled with watermuddy. No problem with fourwheel drive though.23 fire pits from campfires.A fisherman came in the morning but he didnt mind us.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: Parking near hotel Kostelski Buk and waterfalls of river Una

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Faucet at the Belamonix gas station. Good water pressure Gardena connection.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.83)
properties.description: Quiet parking on the hill in front of the fortress. The citadel is illuminated all night so there is light in the parking lot. Nobody cares about you. We recommend you to visit Stari grad Ostroac.

properties.name: Extra services (5)
properties.description: Drinking water fountain with platform for water containers.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.33)
properties.description: Parking Indoor swimming pool.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.89)
properties.description: Ample day and night parking 5 minutes from downtown bar at 2m50 at the entrance. clean and modern sanitary facilities. view of the mountains The final part is on gravel and is free barrier at 2.20m but it was open

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.65)
properties.description: Secret spot and beautiful place with an amazing view. Close to the road but so many cars at night. Nobody was here.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Free quiet parking for 3 and even 4 campers both day and night on a provincial road without services in via Sesto adjacent to the pedestrian cycle path about 600 m from the center of San Candido.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: The site is next to a road but rarely used. The sound of a tiny waterfall can be heard.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.88)
properties.description: All other spots were busy so we found this one. It is in height compared to the SS52 path which goes up to the right  the 2 other paths display the red round sign white background  forbidden to cars. The place is calm. Hiking and mountain biking trails pass through there. There is a flat place playing with bumps and embankments at the first intersection and 2 places higher at the branch to the left but not level. River passing under the bridge if water is needed. The firs provide shelter from the rain. 4G picked up. Park discreetly and clean up well behind you

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.89)
properties.description: Rest area with a bench by the water. It was nice to cool down here. No sign prohibiting campers.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Flat area for one or two cars or motorhomes amazing view to the mountains. Roud is nearby but there was just one car passing by at night.No signs for night parking.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Rest area for a maximum of two camper spaces. The road to get there from Dobbiaco is extremely narrow too narrow for large campers but the view is breathtaking.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: We drove couple meters further to a small gravel dump. Nice and quiet. The road is easy to find and you shouldnt get a problem with the farmer. The original spot which is posted here is now storage for timber.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Behind the building there is a gravel area on the meadow near the gondolas where you can park at night according to the shop owner.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.12)
properties.description: Additional parking for campers unfortunately on the road. directly at the Monte Elmo work station not far from the Sport Arena Sesto with climbing gym minigolf outdoor swimming pool etc. In winter directly at the ski school in summer you can rent mountain bikes and do hikes in the valley or on the mountain

properties.name: Parking MH without service (3.58)
properties.description: Large parking lot at the sports stadium. Flat surface. Very quiet.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.06)
properties.description: Park along the road right uphill. No prohibition signs. Nice spot because next to the river noisy day but quiet at night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.56)
properties.description: Paid parking a little sloping but in a magnificent setting at the start of the hikes.

properties.name: Extra services (3.8)
properties.description: Water fountain in the restaurant next to the caravan park. The restaurant closes at 5pm and we have refilled drinking water a couple of times.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.83)
properties.description: Nice parking with views of the 3 battlements. Located on the road but not too busy at night. Toilet nearby.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.6)
properties.description: Parking at the Tre Cime di Lavaredo viewpoint. parking 24 hours maximum

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: This is a good sized layby just up the road from a large pay  display car park which doesnt allow overnights. Its just off the road but its not too busy or noisy. There is actually another identical layby slightly closer to the car park also.  There are WCs just at the front of the car park but also woods all around  just bury it Theres a large restaurant nearby and a lake up the road also but it isnt great for swimming clay floor. This is a great stop for hikes up to the Tre CimeDrei Zinnen.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Place to stay in the first turn before the cablecar parking.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.65)
properties.description: Parking only during the day next to a beautiful lake and stunning views. Restaurant next to.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: Car park at Unterstalleralm at the end of the Villgratentall valley. Departure for excursions and to visit the nearby waterfall. Hut to eat available where you can pay 6 euros for 24h parking stop and eat because you eat very well. No service and the night is great there is no one.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Next to the street. For one night ok during the day a lot of traffic.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.96)
properties.description: Unpaved area on the side of the road quite flat near the lake in front of the classic Landro crag rock school.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)
properties.description: A very quiet public car park not far from the striking church. Under big trees.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.4)
properties.description: Offroad parking along the road. Also for large motorhomes

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.24)
properties.description: Parking on dirt but well leveled there are no prohibitions it is on the Cortina Dobbiaco cycle path and next to the bus stop for Misurina and the three peaks of Lavaredo in front there is a picnic area with tables and baskets.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Stop on the road. 3min walk to a small river. Starting point for hiking on Monte Piano. There were 3 other campers with us overnight. No sanitary facilities. No service.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.08)
properties.description: Place next to the road. Space few cars. Just before the bridge Torrente Marogna on the way to Lake Misurina.

properties.name: Parking MH without service (4.21)
properties.description: Incredibly scenic parking but now very expensive. Located at 2300 meters. If you wish you can stay the night it is charged every 12 hours even if you go 1 minute over. There is a barrestaurant at the Refuge and you can go for walks around the area.What you pay for is the road itself through a toll and that is where they charge you.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.67)
properties.description: Tree trunk storage ground when empty can be used for overnight stays. Has barriers but high

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice little place on the side of the road with a beautiful view of the valley. Quiet at night to sleep from the passage of the car during the day on the other hand.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.73)
properties.description: Large flat parking with gravel bottom. No service.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking lot without prohibition signs unlike the Obersee 5 minutes away. a bit uneven but there are good flat spots on the sides as well. right on the road but hardly any cars pass by at night. you look at a river and you can also start hikes from there. no service so keep the place clean. You can go to the Obersee for swimming and breakfast. In winter when the pass is closed it can only be reached from Austria

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.55)
properties.description: Very good spot free parking for 2 hours with the blue disc.Impeccable to relax a bit if you arrive early to pass the toll to go to Tre Cime.A restaurant right opposite.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.23)
properties.description: Arrived at the end of the day and left early in the morning parking at night. We were installed in the parking lot reserved for cars just opposite the campsite. The one for camper vans next door is paid day and night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free parking spot for 45 vehicles we were told the space belongs to nobody so we can park there stayed for 2 days without problems. There is fresh water from a small stream nearby drinkable and refreshing.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.25)
properties.description: Hikers car park next to the chapel

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Parking below the Lunellihtte in the forest. Very quiet.

properties.name: Extra services (4.56)
properties.description: Fountain for water supply

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.86)
properties.description: Parking space in the month of May it is not paid and it is at the foot of Lake Misurina. There is a supermarket just opposite.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Parking right before toll road. Spent here night with 3other camper vans. No problem. No service please keep clean.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: We spend the night here and it was amazing. Very peaceful the main road is far enough lot of spaces to parkstay overnight. There was only one more couple spending the night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Parking lot right on the street. We arrived here at night and there were already a few mobile homes parked there. We were able to easily bring our camper van with us. Nice and quiet location in the middle of the forest. There is a great restaurant Ai Lares Agriturismo 15 minutes away by car. The mobile homes parked here looked as if they were staying here for a longer period of time we only stayed for one night. And it was perfectly adequate for that.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Nicely located place between road and the river. Safe at night.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.09)
properties.description: Gravel field on a road very busy during the day but quiet at night. Parking is steep and uneven so only curbside use. We stayed one night no no sign there is nice view

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Quiet place even though it is next to the road. At night there is very little traffic. Quite flat and can easily accommodate 4 or 5 campers or motorhomes.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.21)
properties.description: Flat place nearby the road. Night quiet this is an alternative to the near spots that the accesses are close. Good departure for the lago di sorapis hike.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free parking no height limit next to the access to the bike path at the edge of the river. Next to the road quite noisy during the day but very quiet at night.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Parking in the middle of nature next to the road. The traffic is decreasing and the night is quiet. A 10minute walk from the Tricime exit of trail 215.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)
properties.description: Small parking lot next to the street. Shady ideal for a mountain tour to leave and stay overnight.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Small space on the side of the road. Requires chocks. 1 van or 2 small vans.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.21)
properties.description: Parking spaces directly on the right side of the road as a starting point for hikes to Lago di Sorapis

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.75)
properties.description: Parking shared with cars there are no prohibition signs on asphalt illuminated with also a waste disposal pitch a good starting point for excursions.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: Simple quiet parking near the craft area. in front of a small church and near a stream. shortly after the speck shop Comelico

properties.description: Parking just after the Bosnian border before the bridge a few spaces possible for all vehicles oyster farm fishing swimming rather nice view for information it was customs who indicated this parking to me

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Nice flat place with beautiful view to castle. Same access road as the spot nearby. Only for smlaler campervan. You can meet here some fishermans. But the place is amazing. No 4x4 needed.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Calm area next to the center of Opuzen. This parking is next to the river Neretva no tap water no electricity but safe spot to stay a night. Shop Studenac and pubs nearby. Parking is 20meters from Guest house Fosa here is super nice owner grandpa Tomo who can help you.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.67)
properties.description: Stony and narrow path to the spot but right on the water and no people around. I recommend fourwheel drive and scratchresistant paint that wont get scratched by the bushes.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.62)
properties.description: safe quiet beautiful view of the city

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Nice place overlooking the bay. Located on a kind of closed water bunker. Nice place to cook and to spend the night but nothing else to do. In the distance you can see the defensive wall between Ston and Mali Ston. Only drawback you can hear the road that runs across the bay. Occasionally the pump in the water bunker will kick on not loudly. If you are coming from Mali Ston take the exit on the right after the exit to Luka. After about 2 km on the country road you come to the cape. Is visible on Google maps satellite.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Nice place for the night quiet and safe but very windy

properties.name: Extra services (3.88)
properties.description: New fuel station with tap for water filling

properties.name: Extra services (3.57)
properties.description: There is a water tap 10 meters from the entrance at the hedge. no hose available. For free.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Place where You can fill clean water.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.1)
properties.description: Parking with trees near the beach. We stayed during night without any problem. We payed about 20kn.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.6)
properties.description: Small spot in the middle of the bush completely isolated. Accessible only by van or 4x4. Last stony and narrow portion. 50m away magnificent view over the bay of Neum. 1 single location flat at the end of the path. Most total calm.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: Gravel parking lot above the small church. Little through traffic and a little off the beaten track. very large but only single level pieces. nearby are ruins to visit. tarred to reach with every camper size.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.2)
properties.description: Nice quiet parking space ideal for one night

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.88)
properties.description: Large asphalted parking space on churchcementary site. Very queit just a few cars passing nearby also we saw a police car passing by but they didint stopped or say anything so we figured were allowed to be here. Easy access to all kind of campers. Bad internet connection  Spent a great night and afternoon here without any problems please keep it clean and calm so it wont be a prohibition sign here

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: A drinking tap next to the bakery. Very friendly staff.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Simple parking before Stolac towards Dubrovnik or Neum. Located between a bakery Pekara and a small restaurant that sells evapi 10 mutton sausages in a round loaf served with raw onions. Has the merit to exist In addition there is WiFi free

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)
properties.description: Leaving the main road you can climb a path of chaille for a few meters and reach a beautiful flat. On foot one can climb to the top of a hill to admire the view.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: We just stopped for lunch during the day but it sounds like a great place to sleep. It is located at the bottom of a dirt road 50m below the road. At 3 p.m. we couldnt hear the noise of the cars at all. There are two beautiful and wide places in the shade. Access to the sea is via a small alley very cute. It takes 2 min on foot.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice quiet place next to a cemetery. Easy access for all types of cars. Absolutely quiet for one night.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.25)
properties.description: Ideal for a stopover for a night large car park with different spaces car truck bus toilets open 247 possible to refill water tap under the outdoor sinks picnic tables etc roadside busy so do not come if you are looking for peace.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Roadside parking spaces with mountain views and a fishing spot. Close to the road so a little noisy in the morning a few heavy goods vehicles in the evening. Troubleshoot for 1 night. Flat land max 4 vans. 3 minutes from the supermarket and 10 minutes from the ferry departure for the island of Mljet and a white sand beach and transparent water

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.1)
properties.description: Nice parking lot perfect for transit to Dubrovnik and beyond. Location directly on a road above Komarna. Relatively quiet at night. Super nice view of the Peljeski Bridge. Kiosk with coffee cold drinks seating etc. is open during the day. No sign prohibiting overnight stays.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (2.5)
properties.description: Parking in a quiet residential area next to a soccer field.

properties.name: Extra services (3)
properties.description: Drinking water point at the base of Sto Castle.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Free parking near the town centre. We parked here for the day to visit Stolac. Short walk of 10 mins to the centre and road leading to the Fort. Quiet all day on Friday and friendly locals. Spaces big enough for our 6.7m long van.Drinking water at the church opposite. Road drain for grey water. We didnt stay the night but would feel safe. Nice church courtyard with lots of shade and benches for hot days.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.3)
properties.description: Motorhome and car park convenient to visit Ston no services.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)
properties.description: Next to the river with generous shade trees. Bus station next door. Quiet and close to shops and restaurants

properties.name: Extra services (4.5)
properties.description: Drinking water and street parking.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (2.67)
properties.description: The square is at the end of a narrow street near the village of Mali Ston. The fortress wall can be visited in the village. Locals sometimes pass here to get to their gardens. Otherwise the place is very quiet here. Next to this place is a power house which makes a slight humming noise in the evening. The street is a bit narrow in parts but still manageable for a Bulli.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.89)
properties.description: Rest area Winery Rizman

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.22)
properties.description: Small free parking in the city center a dozen places. We stayed for one night staying discreet. Quite quiet despite a little passage. Good for a night rather to help out. No prohibitions.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.5)
properties.description: Replacement at the waters edge. follow a dirt road that starts further north on the road.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.2)
properties.description: Good spot for overnight stay. Close to road but quiet almost no cars at night. Good access for bigger Van. I guess with good comfort for 34 cars. We did not see any people there.

properties.name: Extra services (4.71)
properties.description: Drinking water under the shop on the wall.Aslo nice roofed picnic area and many benches by the bulla pool.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.14)
properties.description: Really nice spot  isolated you need to drive for 10 min on a dirt road. Then paradise

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.5)
properties.description: Narrow path suitable for smaller vehicles.  Level ground.  Surrounded by olive trees.  There was a little noise from the road.

properties.name: Free motorhome area (2.95)
properties.description: Campers are already spending the night here.  It is next to the road so you shouldnt expect peace and quiet.Free electricity access possible from one point 12 1 plugs available

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.36)

But van with 5.5m passes without problem. Surely quiet at night but sloping. Best access is from south narrow gravelconcrete road.

properties.name: Picnic area (4)

In summer time there is also a beach bar and grill. Owner and locals are very friendly and welcoming and they let us stay there over night. Highly recommended place

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.71)
properties.description: Very remote beautiful spot on a kind of forest road. You stand in the middle of nature next to a small cross and have a spectacular view of the surrounding mountains. You feel a bit like being in Africa and Mongolia at the same time. In the morning a farmer and his kids came by to collect wood nearby otherwise we were completely alone.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.29)
properties.description: Free place by the road few places not far away beautiful beach with turquoise water and sand.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.29)
properties.description: Parking at the bypass. no service

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

Frendly owner who is selling    some traditional products in shed in front of parking place allow us to spend the peacefull night there for free. He said that everything is not in money but anyway  we bought some product from him next morning.

properties.name: Extra services (4)
properties.description: I was able to recharge water for the camping car for free at this petrol station. Hose available. It is at stand number 6.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: If you want to go to Mjelt by the first ferry you can also park directly next to the ferry terminal. When I arrived there were countless commuter cars and visitors to the island. Nobody worried about the fact that I slept in the car. In the morning the toilets were open. Very good reception

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)
properties.description: One or two places by the beach in a small hamlet. properties.name: Extra services (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.54)
properties.description: Church Holy Place Apparition of the Virgin Mary

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.25)
properties.description: Space for 2 vans great view

Located in a small layby directly on the country road. Beautiful river with crystal clear water invites you to swim.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.44)

The sanitary facilities are getting old and average clean. The staff a bit bored and especially in the bar at the entrance we had the feeling that we shouldnt order anything could do some work. Not worth the price we paid for one night.

properties.name: Picnic area (4.25)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.1)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.75)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)
properties.description: church of our Lady of the rosary spotLovely tranquil spot next to a church and cemetery.only down side can be the hunters shooting in the background which didnt bothered us.in summer park directly at the right on the gravel and you have shade in the morning

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.67)
properties.description: Along the road small gravel car park of a chapel in the middle of the vineyards 5 minutes from the village. Stayed one night without a hitch.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Gekiester Parkplatz an einer Kapelle. Super schn ruhig und blickgeschtzt von der Strae. Man kann auf beiden Seiten der Kapelle stehen.. An der angrenzenden Strae ist Campieren verboten also gut mglich dass das Stehen an der Kapelle whrend der Saison nicht geduldet wird wir waren im Herbst also abseits derSaison dort. Dann aber unproblematisch und sehr schn.

properties.name: Picnic area (2.5)

properties.name: Extra services (4.65)
properties.description: LPG station also for refilling propane bottles. 14 kn per liter

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.08)

There is a trim passing a few times a day which isnt perfect but not very noisy either. The way there is narrow so its nothing for big Campers. Sadly not free of trash but you can help by taking some with you.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: A pitch with an incredible view. The parking space itself is in a curve of a gravel road. But this is almost never or not at all used you need good nerves to drive up here. But with the T5 2WD it wasnt a problem. View of the sea and the valley. Not recommended with a larger vehicle than a van except 4WD

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Nice place on the Neretva river. There is good access to the water for swimming. To get there you have to drive through the village of itomislii and then follow the dirt road along the river.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.83)
properties.description: We were looking for the small forest in front but the GPS took us to the other side of the river and it just took us to this small esplanade. There are no shaded areas but for a night it is fine. The site was quite clean and it is located near a dwelling. A little further down there are two tables next to the river. To access it you go through a paved but narrow street the train tracks are very close but if a train passes by it is not annoying we only hear one at night and in the morning we hear another.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.22)
properties.description: Small beach  dock in a very quiet cove one minute below the main road. Access a little steep but paved. Some locals who walk their dog or come to bathe.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)
properties.description: Nice quiet and clean place next to an old villa right on the water. Driveway a bit bumpy and narrow but also possible with a 6.6m mobile home.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Lovely place to park which was confirmed to us by the cave staff. The cave is 200 metres up the road and is very worth the visit at 8.5 each or 7. Toilets here too. Wonderful views of the mountain range and orchard below. The caves also have parking themselves separate to this area. as we were leaving the area we also noticed a bike pump and oiling station just up the sloped road from this parking spot. Could be handy if travelling with or by bike. Worth noting the road that goes away from this spot and past the caves is not suitable for vans or motorhomes. Our gps took us that way and it was awful. AVOID

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.57)

Only one day came the technician of the plant to control and he told us very kindly that there were no problems.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (5)
properties.description: Public parking in small village close to the sea with swimming spots. Quiet place.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.48)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.67)

He said its okay to stay here as long as you park in the corner and dont disturb anyone. We spent a good night and had a nice breakfast in the gasstation next door. There were barriers but they never closed

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.83)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.27)

properties.name: Extra services (4.67)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.41)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.82)
properties.description: Small very quiet car park with a view of the river and a large green space. better than the aquarium parking lot which is too crowded.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.33)
properties.description: Parking of the stadium. A lot of place. Obviously to use if there are no matches. So green also excellent for the dog.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.21)
properties.description: Great place to spend the night by a river. Accessible by car but a little bumpy road. Pleasant swimming.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.18)

There is also a covered fireplace with tables and benches. Unfortunately the way there is a bit hidden and uneven so it is not recommended for mobile homes but we managed it well with our T5. Please keep the pitch clean and feel free to leave a donation D

properties.name: Picnic area (3)
properties.description: Place at the edge of a small river with a bench and a corner to make fire. A village is not far but some locals came to walk without coming to see me. I had a good quiet night. Near a small road with very little passage. Beware the soil was wet and I got bogged down. The floor is not very straight but I managed to wedge properly.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.1)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.43)
properties.description: Many tables some covered barbecue area next to the small pond very nice.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.14)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.75)

It might be necessary to ask the inhabitants not to disturb them  where to be disturbed. the place is about a hundred meters from the main road

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.5)

The night was quiet despite the road being nearby.EDIT A few meters away right on the street there is another parking lot thats where we stood. There is a small playground almost direct access to the river and 4G internet. The parking lot is in front of the small caf mentioned in the text if asked it is okay to stay overnight there even without consumption. Theres delicious coffee in the morning.

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3.33)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (3)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.4)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.75)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.33)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

There you are at the foot of a wooden house in ruins. Super quiet night no passage

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4.33)

Coming from Senj after the bridge behind the empty restaurant turn left at the 60 sign. Then further left around the curve. The beginning of the street is still tarred and the houses are inhabited then it becomes a gravel road but easily accessible by bus. Steep path partly narrow. We were traveling with a Sprinter about 5m long without a 4x4. RIGHTLY NOT RECOMMENDED FOR LONGER MOBILE You can turn around at the top of the parking space. If you go past the last houses a footpath leads up the mountain and after about 10 minutes you have a wonderful view of the sea and islands but the photo was taken further above. PLEASE RESPECT THIS PLACE AND BE DISCRETE

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (4)
properties.description: Intersection leading to Bjele and Samarian Rocks trails. I accessed it from the south driving from Ogulin towards the coast. This main road that goes all the way to Novi Vinodolski is VERY bad full of huge cracks on the asphalt that can easily blow up your tire. Drive carefully all the way and avoid nighttime. Along the main road youll see a sign Bjele Stiene shortly afterbefore Jasenak. From there is a good 4kms of rough gravel road with plenty of potholes until reaching the parking spot. Theres space for 3 vans at most. You can either walk up to the trailhead of Bjele Stiene or drive up to the other parking lot last photograph. However the road is even worse and steeper  no motorhomes past this point Whichever choice youll have a quiet night and I doubt anyone will say anything. I stayed here for one night without problems. Its possible to carry on for another 6kms from the intersection to reach the trailhead of Samarian Stiene

properties.name: Surrounded by nature (5)
properties.description: Nice clearing. In summer you can pick cranberries here. We spoke to two locals and they both said that it would not be a problem to stand here overnight. We stayed 2 nights. From here you can hike in about 4 km to the starting point 13th kilometer of the Begova Staza from where you can climb to the Bijelih stijene and the Samarskih stijene. Warning you cannot drive directly to the 13th kilometer from here you have to walk the 4 km We decided on this location for parking sleeping because it is definitely not in the nature reserve the 13th kilometer is on the edge of it. The nature reserve officially has the highest protection regulations that exist for nature areas. However we do not know whether these will be checked. The journey from Begova Razdoljia is about 20 minutes on a gravel road. But this has no large potholes or similar. and is easy to drive even from an old VW T4 and leads through beautiful nature

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (3.86)
properties.description: Several large parking spaces in the parking lot of the western village Roswell which was built as a backdrop for the Winnetou film in 2016 and is open to visitors today. The approach via a gravel road is a bit bumpy but feasible even for large motorhomes. Please do not just stand there but ask the villagers beforehand and pay the entrance to the western village if you want to see it. Entry to the film set costs 30 kuna per family or 20 kuna per adult. The opening times are as follows Tuesday  Friday 400 p.m.  800 p.m. SaturdaySunday 1000 a.m.  800 p.m. Monday closed Watch the film set. Events are held here regularly on weekends. The inhabitants of the small western village are incredibly nice and look forward to every visit. Some dogs and puppies a goat and several horses also live there. In 3 km distance there are larger bathing lakes in the south and in the northeast which are ideal for a day trip. The nature is beautiful and very spacious.

properties.name: Parking lot day/night (4.5)
properties.description: ABOUT USNestled amidst centuryold oak trees our privatelyowned picnic area offers serene tables shaded by natures canopy accommodating multiple cars or up to 8 motorhomes. Enjoy sweeping vistas of the picturesque Vipava Valley gather around the firepit for a delightful picnic experience and relish ample green space for leisurely activities.We kindly ask guests to maintain the pristine environment by disposing of trash responsibly and leaving the area clean. DIRECTIONSTo reach us take the Ajdovina exit from the motorway and head towards Planina. Upon reaching Dolenje turn left and continue towards Planina. After 2 kilometers turn right at the first crossroad past Dolenje. Look for the sign indicating the village of Planina then turn right onto the gravel road. Proceed 200 meters to reach our tranquil oasis.DONATIONSYour generous donations support the continual development of our cherished space.

Once at the top hundreds of wild horses and stunning landscapes as far as the eye can see. A few hundred meters away is a refuge which must be open certain months of the year. It is also the start of several hikes in particular towards Mont Cincar. We went back down on the other side towards Suhaca the road is still in worse condition than from Livno. To avoid.

There is also a possibility of renting bikes. Camper vans are welcome.WINEMAKING The Amon family business is the oldest private winemaking company in Slovenia. The excellent Amon  wines originate from the vineyards of the marjeVirtanj winegrowing region. Several Slovenian and international awards confirm the top quality of the Amon wine.GUEST HOUSE Decorated in the rustic style of a wine cellar with details originating from the winegrowing heritage. The Amon food is based on old household recipes and made from local ecological ingredients. The estate has received the certificate for ecological farming and therefore chefs use vegetables from the Amon garden homemade productscan also be bought in their Grandmas shop. BOARDING HOUSE Situated in an oasis of greenery surrounded by a forest on one side and with an open view towards the sunny east and the golf course. Furnished with top quality ecological materials of harmonious colours. Modern conference rooms are available for business meetings and seminars.

Although we also went up with our 6.40 m motorhome.

Highly recommended to make the effort to go up in AC on the track There are car parks higher up but we no longer wanted to risk AC.

From the rest area you can enjoy an excellent view of the M.Baldo chain of M.Bondone and the Brenta group. Entering the paths you face the splendid scenery of the Little Dolomites.
